name: Disable Shaders
description:
Pretty self explanatory lol
Set this to true if you're having a problem with shaders!

name: Disable Mechanic
description:
Set to true if you're having a problem with the mechanics.
[Affected Song: Powerdown, Unbeatable]

name: Disable Video
description:
Check this if you don't want a video to be played.
[Example: intro Demise]

name: Window Effects
description:
Uncheck this to disable window effects, like movement and resolution.(WINDOWS ONLY)
[Example: No Party & Somari, window resolution]
This also disable Paranoia Modchart
